episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of quirky and intriguing topics, including the effects of polyester pants on rats, entertainment activities for troops during World War I, the extreme heat on Venus, and a unique Icelandic app to prevent accidental incest.

facts.fact: Rats wearing polyester pants can't get directions.
During the First World War, entertainment for the troops included organised pillow fights, wheelbarrow races and wrestling on the backs of mules.
The atmosphere on Venus is so hot that if you took a pizza out of a freezer, it would cook in three seconds.
In Iceland, there is a phone app that tells you if you're related to the person that you're hitting on.
